directories.title: Global settings of OpenAPI MCP Server

code.description: The content of the Terraform HCL code. For more information, see [the HCL language overview](https://help.aliyun.com/zh/terraform/terraform-configuration-and-hcl-language-overview).

schema.description: The request body.

hash.description: The unique identifier of the Terraform HCL code.

isValid.description: Indicates whether the code is valid.

items.description: The content of the error message.
items.example: Unclosed configuration block: There is no closing brace for this block before the end of the file. This may be caused by incorrect brace nesting elsewhere in this file.

{
      "schema": {
        "writeOnly": false,
        "nullable": false,
        "description": "要修改的VPC名称。\n\n名称长度为1～128个字符，不能以`http://`或`https://`开头。",
        "readOnly": false,
        "type": "string",
        "required": false
      },
      "deprecated": false,
      "allowEmptyValue": false,
      "name": "name",
      "required": false,
      "example": "terraform-example"
    }

diagnosticReport.description: The diagnostic report for the code.
diagnosticReport.example: Argument or block definition required: An argument or block definition is required here.

schema.description: The response.

400.errorMessage: Empty code is not valid.
400.description: The Code parameter is an invalid empty string.

400.errorMessage: Code is mandatory for this action.
400.description: The required parameter Code is missing.

500.errorMessage: The request has failed due to a temporary failure of the server.

ApiMcpServerValidateHcl.title: ApiMcpServerValidateHcl
ApiMcpServerValidateHcl.summary: Validates the HashiCorp Configuration Language (HCL) syntax for Terraform.

clientToken.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. Generate a unique value from your client for this parameter. The ClientToken parameter supports only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. Use a UUID. The token expires in 3 days.

description.description: The description of the API MCP service.

language.description: The language of the API document for the API MCP service. You can select Chinese or English. The language of the prompt can affect the AI's response.

product.description:
The product code.

- Call the GetRequestLog operation and obtain the product code from the response.

- Find the product code in the URL of the product's page in OpenAPI Portal. For example, the URL for the OpenAPI Portal page of Short Message Service is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code is Dysmsapi.

apiVersion.description: The POP version of the API that is exposed to the MCP server.

selectors.description: The list of API name matching rules. This parameter cannot be empty.

apis.description: The list of APIs to add. This parameter cannot be empty.

product.description:
The product code.

- Call the GetRequestLog operation and obtain the product code from the response.

- Find the product code in the URL of the product's page in OpenAPI Portal. For example, the URL for the OpenAPI Portal page of Short Message Service is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code is Dysmsapi.

apiVersion.description: The POP version of the API that is exposed to the MCP server.

apiOverrideJson.description: The API metadata in JSON format. For the format, see https\://api.aliyun.com/meta/v1/products/Ecs/versions/2014-05-26/apis/DescribeInstances/api.json. You can overwrite the summary and parameters fields.

executeCliCommand.description: Specifies whether to return the command-line interface (CLI) command for execution. In this mode, the API call is not executed. Instead, the corresponding CLI command is returned. This mode is suitable for long-running tasks that need to be executed using the Alibaba Cloud CLI.

enableOutputSchema.description: Specifies whether to return the schema of the response parameters. Returning the schema increases the size of the API MCP server. The default value is null, which indicates that the schema is not returned.

key.description: The parameter name. Only first-level parameter names are supported. For ROA-style APIs, you can set the parameter to body.xx. You cannot set values for parameters that are not top-level parameters.

constParameters.description: The list of constant input parameters. These parameters are not included in the output during API parameter parsing.

additionalApiDescriptions.description: The list of additional API descriptions.

name.description: The prompt name.

content.description: The content of the prompt. Variables are specified in the {{xxx}} format. xxx is a variable that must be defined in the arguments parameter.

name.description: The parameter name.

required.description: Specifies whether the parameter is required.

items.description: A parameter supported by the prompt.

arguments.description: The list of parameters supported by the prompt.

name.description: The name of the MCP server. The name must be 3 to 64 characters in length, cannot start with a digit, and can contain only lowercase letters and digits (a-z and 0-9). The name must be unique within the same Alibaba Cloud account.

oauthClientId.description:
The custom OAuth client ID that is used when you select a custom OAuth configuration.

`Only web and native applications are supported. The OAuth scope must include /acs/mcp-server.`

instructions.description: The MCP instruction. It prompts the large model on how to use the MCP. The client must support the Instructions field of the standard MCP protocol.

enableAssumeRole.description: Specifies whether to enable multi-account access.

assumeRoleName.description: The name of the RAM role in the destination account that you assume for cross-account operations when multi-account access is enabled.

assumeRoleExtraPolicy.description: An additional policy for role assumption when multi-account access is enabled. If this policy is specified, the permissions for the role assumption are based on this policy, which overwrites the permissions defined for the role itself.

code.description: The code for the Terraform tool. For more information, see [Overview of the HCL language](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/terraform/latest/overview-of-the-hcl-language).

name.description: The name of the Terraform tool.

description.description: The description of the Terraform tool.

async.description: Specifies whether to execute tasks asynchronously. If set to true, the system immediately proceeds to the next task after initiating a task execution, without waiting for each resource operation to complete.

destroyPolicy.description:
The deletion policy. After a task is executed, the system applies one of the following cleanup policies to temporary resources based on the task execution status:

- NEVER: Does not delete resources. All created resources are retained, regardless of whether the task succeeds or fails.

- ALWAYS: Always deletes resources. All related resources are immediately destroyed after the task is completed, regardless of whether it succeeds or fails.

- ON\_FAILURE: Deletes resources upon failure. Related resources are deleted only when the task fails. If the task succeeds, the resources are retained.

publicAccess.description: Specifies whether to enable public access.

enableCustomVpcWhitelist.description: Specifies whether to enable a custom VPC whitelist. If not enabled, the account-level configuration is used.

items.description: An entry in the VPC whitelist. The value is the source VPC ID.

vpcWhitelists.description: The VPC whitelist that specifies the allowed source VPCs when public access is disabled. If you do not set this parameter or leave it empty, access from all sources is allowed.

schema.description: Creates an API MCP service instance.

id.description: The ID of the successfully created API MCP service.

sse.description: The connection information for the SSE protocol.

mcp.description: The connection information for the streamable HTTP protocol. This is the recommended protocol.

vpcSse.description: The connection address for the SSE protocol in a VPC.

vpcMcp.description: The connection address for the streamable HTTP protocol in a VPC.

urls.description: The connection information for the API MCP service.

The custom OAuth Client ID when you select a custom OAuth configuration.

`Only Web and Native applications are supported. The OAuth scope must include /acs/mcp-server`

code.description: The Terraform tool code. For more information, see [HCL language overview](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/terraform/terraform-configuration-and-hcl-language-overview).

name.description: The name of the Terraform tool.

description.description: The description of the Terraform tool.

async.description: Specifies whether to execute tasks asynchronously. If this parameter is set to true, the system proceeds to the next task immediately after a task is initiated, without waiting for each resource operation to complete.

destroyPolicy.description:
The deletion policy. After a task is executed, the system applies one of the following cleanup policies to temporary resources based on the task execution status.

- NEVER: All created resources are retained, regardless of whether the task is successful or fails.

- ALWAYS: All related resources are immediately destroyed after the task is complete, regardless of whether the task is successful or fails.

- ON\_FAILURE: Related resources are deleted only if the task fails. If the task is successful, the resources are retained.

instructions.description: The MCP instruction. This prompts the large language model on how to use the MCP. The client must support the Instructions field of the standard MCP protocol.

enableAssumeRole.description: Specifies whether to enable multi-account access.

assumeRoleName.description: The name of the RAM role in the destination account that is assumed for cross-account operations when multi-account access is enabled.

assumeRoleExtraPolicy.description: An additional policy for role assumption when multi-account access is enabled. If this policy is specified, it overwrites the permissions of the role itself.

publicAccess.description: Specifies whether to enable public network access.

enableCustomVpcWhitelist.description: Specifies whether to enable a custom VPC whitelist. If this parameter is not enabled, the account-level configuration is used.

items.description: An allowed VPC in the whitelist. The value is the source VPC ID.

vpcWhitelists.description: The VPC whitelist that specifies the allowed source VPCs after public network access is disabled. If you do not set this parameter or leave it empty, access from all sources is allowed.

GetApiMcpServer.title: GetApiMcpServer

GetApiMcpServerUserConfig.summary: Queries the global API MCP Server configuration for a user. The configuration specifies whether public network access is enabled and includes a whitelist of source VPC IDs for requests from a VPC.

accountId.description: The ID of your Alibaba Cloud account.

enablePublicAccess.description: Specifies if public network access is enabled for all API MCP Servers under the account, including system MCP Servers. Public access is enabled by default. If disabled, servers can only be accessed through VPC domain names.

items.description: An entry in the VPC whitelist. The value is the ID of a source VPC.

vpcWhitelists.description: The whitelist of source VPCs. This is used when public network access is disabled. If this parameter is not set or is empty, the source is not restricted.

gmtCreate.description: The time when the configuration was created.

gmtModified.description: The time when the configuration was last updated.

GetApiMcpServerUserConfig.title: GetApiMcpServerUserConfig

schema.description: The error code based on which you want to query a solution.
The error message for which you want to query a solution. This parameter must be configured together with the errorCode parameter.
schema.example: The resource is not in a valid state for the operation.

schema.description:
The product code. You can use one of the following methods to query a product code:

- Call the GetRequestLog operation to query a product code from the response.

- Query the code of a product in the OpenAPI Explorer URL of the product. For example, the OpenAPI Explorer URL of Short Message Service (SMS) is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. Therefore, the product code of SMS is Dysmsapi.

The language of the solution. Valid values: zh-CN and en-US. Not all of the solutions are available in English. If you set this parameter to en-US, but the corresponding solution is actually not available in English, no response is returned.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.

solutions.description: The solutions. Not all error codes have corresponding solutions. You can submit a ticket or use OpenAPI Explorer to contact technical support if necessary.

content.description: The content of the solution, which is in the markdown format.
content.example:
Unsupported transit router status
====

Cause
----

The transit router is in an unstable state.

* * *

Solution
----

Try again after the transit router enters a stable state. You can check whether the transit router is in a stable state based on the following information.

Example
------

Before you proceed, make sure that the transit route is in a stable state.

1. Go to the console. If the status of the transit router in the Transit Router list is Available, the transit router is in a stable state.

2. Call the ListTransitRouters operation. If Active is returned for Status, the transit router is in a stable state.

GetErrorCodeSolutions.title: Queries an error solution by error code
GetErrorCodeSolutions.summary: Queries an error solution by error code.
GetErrorCodeSolutions.description: You can call this API operation to query public information instead of special information, such as the account ownership. Permissions on this API operation cannot be granted to other members.

schema.description: The request ID of the log to query. The ID is the unique identifier (UUID) of an API request and must be in uppercase.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response schema.

logInfo.description: The details of the API request log.

basicInfo.description: The basic information about the API request.

api.description: The name of the API in the queried log.

aliyunSite.description: The URL of the API reference for the China site (aliyun.com).

alibabacloudSite.description: The URL of the API reference for the international site (alibabacloud.com).

productName.description: The name of the product in Chinese and English.

cnName.description: The Chinese name of the product.

enName.description: The English name of the product.

apiStyle.description: The API style. Valid values: \`ROA\` and \`RPC\`.

logRequestId.description: The request ID that is passed in the request.

httpStatusCode.description: The HTTP status code in the queried log.

errorCode.description: The error code in the queried log. This parameter is empty if no error is reported for the request.

errorMessage.description: The error message in the queried log. This parameter is empty if no error is reported for the request.
errorMessage.example: The resource is not in a valid state for the operation.

accessDeniedDetail.description: The details of the permission error.

policyType.description: The type of the policy that caused the permission error.

authPrincipalOwnerId.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the current identity belongs.

authPrincipalType.description: The identity type of the operator.

noPermissionType.description: The reason why the permission was denied.

authAction.description: The specific operation that caused the permission error.

encodedDiagnosticMessage.description: The encoded diagnostic information. Call the \`DecodeDiagnosticMessage\` operation of RAM to obtain more diagnostic information.

requestDuration.description: The time that elapses from when the gateway receives the request to when the gateway returns the response. Unit: ms.

sdkRequestTime.description: The time when the request was initiated. The time is in the \`yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ\` format and is in UTC.

gatewayProcessTime.description: The time when the gateway received the request. The time is in the \`yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ\` format and is in UTC.

endpoint.description: The endpoint of the service in the region.

throttlingResult.description: The result of the throttling check.\`FC.PASS\`: The request was not blocked by throttling.\`FC.DENY\`: The request was blocked by throttling.

callerType.description:
The type of the caller. Valid values:

1. customer: An Alibaba Cloud account.

2. sub: A RAM user.

3. AssumedRoleUser: A temporary identity that uses a Security Token Service (STS) token.

callerIp.description: The IP address of the caller.

masterAccountId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.

callerAccountId.description: The ID of the caller's account.

signatureMethod.description:
The signature algorithm. Valid values:

- \`HMAC-SHA1\`: The request is signed using the HMAC-SHA1 algorithm.

- \`HMAC-SHA256\`: The request is signed using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm.

authenticationType.description:
The authentication type. Valid values:

- \`AK\`: an AccessKey, which can be a permanent AccessKey, a temporary AccessKey, or an STS token.

- \`PRIVATEKEY\`: an AccessKey for asymmetric key encryption.

- \`BEARERTOKEN\`: an authentication mechanism that is widely used in the OAuth 2.0 framework and cloud services.

- \`CUSTOM\_SPI\`: an efficient and secure authentication method that is suitable for the delivery and management of Software as a Service (SaaS) products in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace.

- \`Anonymous\`: anonymous access.

- \`DPS\`: similar to an AccessKey, but uses a product-specific signature algorithm that is different from the official Alibaba Cloud algorithm.

name.description: The name of the request parameter.

value.description: The value of the request parameter.

required.description: Specifies whether the request parameter is required.

type.description: The type of the request parameter.

responses.description: The information returned for the request.

responseBodyFormat.description: The format of the response body. Valid values: \`JSON\`, \`XML\`, and \`HTML\`.

GetOwnRequestLog.title: GetOwnRequestLog
GetOwnRequestLog.summary: Queries the details of an OpenAPI call log for your account using the request ID returned from an API call. This operation is used for troubleshooting.
GetOwnRequestLog.description: This API does not support authorization.

schema.description:
The product code.

- Call the GetRequestLog operation and find the product code in the response.

- Find the product code in the URL of the OpenAPI Portal page for the product. For example, <props="china">the URL for the Short Message Service (SMS) OpenAPI Portal page is https\://api.aliyun.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code is Dysmsapi.</props>
  <props="intl">the URL for the Short Message Service (SMS) OpenAPI Portal page is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code is Dysmsapi.</props>
The endpoint information.

GetProductEndpoints.title: GetProductEndpoints
GetProductEndpoints.summary: Retrieves the endpoint information for a product.

GetRequestLog.summary: Queries the details of a request log based on a request ID to help you troubleshoot issues.
GetRequestLog.description: You can query call logs across different RAM users or Alibaba Cloud accounts using RAM authorization or role assumption. For more information about authorization, see [Authorize cross-account API error diagnosis](~~2868101~~).

schema.description: The request ID of the log that you want to query. The request ID is the unique identifier of an API request. It is in the UUID format and must be in uppercase.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response schema.

logInfo.description: The details of the API request log.

basicInfo.description: The basic information about the API request.

api.description: The name of the API that was called in the request.

apiDoc.description: The information about the API reference.

aliyunSite.description: The link to the API reference on the Alibaba Cloud China Website (www\.aliyun.com).

alibabacloudSite.description: The link to the API reference on the Alibaba Cloud International Website (www\.alibabacloud.com).

productName.description: The name of the product, including the Chinese and English names.

cnName.description: The Chinese name of the product.

enName.description: The English name of the product.

apiStyle.description: The API style. Valid values: ROA and RPC.

logRequestId.description: The request ID that was passed in.

httpStatusCode.description: The HTTP status code in the log.

errorCode.description: The error code in the log. This field is empty if no error was reported for the request.

errorMessage.description: The error message in the log. This field is empty if no error was reported for the request.
errorMessage.example: The resource is not in a valid state for the operation.

accessDeniedDetail.description: The details of the permission error. This field is returned only if an authentication error occurred for the request ID.

policyType.description: The type of the policy that caused the permission error.

authPrincipalOwnerId.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the current identity belongs.

authPrincipalType.description: The type of the operator's identity.

noPermissionType.description: The reason for the permission error.

authAction.description: The specific operation that caused the permission error.

encodedDiagnosticMessage.description: The encoded diagnostic information. You can call the DecodeDiagnosticMessage operation of RAM to obtain more diagnostic information.

httpMethod.description: The HTTP request method, such as GET, PUT, and POST.

requestDuration.description: The time elapsed from when the gateway received the request to when the gateway returned a response. Unit: milliseconds (ms).

sdkRequestTime.description: The time when the request was initiated. The date is in the ISO 8601 format and the time is in UTC. The format is yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

gatewayProcessTime.description: The time when the gateway received the request. The date is in the ISO 8601 format and the time is in UTC. The format is yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ.

endpoint.description: The endpoint of the service in the region.

throttlingResult.description: The result of the throttling check. FC.PASS indicates that the request was not blocked by throttling. FC.DENY indicates that the request was blocked by throttling.

callerType.description:
The type of the caller.

1. customer: An Alibaba Cloud account.

2. sub: A RAM user.

3. AssumedRoleUser: A temporary identity that uses a Security Token Service (STS) token.

callerIp.description: The IP address of the caller.

masterAccountId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.

callerAccountId.description: The ID of the caller's account.

signatureMethod.description:
The signature method.

- HMAC-SHA1: The request is signed using the HMAC-SHA1 algorithm.

- HMAC-SHA256: The request is signed using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm.

authenticationType.description:
The authentication type.

- AK: an AccessKey, which can be a permanent AccessKey, a temporary AccessKey, or an STS token.

- PRIVATEKEY: an AccessKey of the asymmetric key encryption type.

- BEARERTOKEN: an identity verification mechanism that is widely used in the OAuth 2.0 framework and cloud services.

- CUSTOM\_SPI: an efficient and secure authentication method that is suitable for the delivery and management of Software as a Service (SaaS) products in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace.

- Anonymous: anonymous access.

- DPS: similar to an AccessKey, but the signature algorithm is different from the official Alibaba Cloud algorithm. This type is exclusive to specific products.

name.description: The name of the request parameter.

value.description: The value of the request parameter.

required.description: Indicates whether the request parameter is required.

type.description: The type of the request parameter.

responseBodyFormat.description: The format of the response body. Valid values: JSON, XML, and HTML.

400.errorMessage: Please ensure that the request ID you provided originates from a request you made to a certain OpenAPI.
400.description: The parameter logRequestId is invalid. Make sure that the request ID you provide originates from a request you made to a OpenAPI.

404.errorMessage: The log related to this logRequestId does not exist, has expired, or you do not have permission to view it.
404.description: The log associated with this logRequestId does not exist, has expired, or you do not have permission to view it.

GetRequestLog.title: GetRequestLog

schema.description:
The product code.

- Call the GetRequestLog operation and obtain the product code from the response.

- Find the product code in the URL of the product's OpenAPI Portal page. For example, <props="china">the URL of the OpenAPI Portal page for Short Message Service is https\://api.aliyun.com/product/Dysmsapi. Based on this URL, the product code for Short Message Service is Dysmsapi.</props>
  <props="intl">the URL of the OpenAPI Portal page for Short Message Service is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. Based on this URL, the product code for Short Message Service is Dysmsapi.</props>
The version of the API.
The open metadata.

ListApiDefinitions.title: ListApiDefinitions
ListApiDefinitions.summary: Retrieves the OpenAPI metadata for a product.

schema.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page for a paged query. The maximum value is 100. The default value is 20.
The number of entries to skip.

The token to start the next query. Set this parameter to the value of the NextToken parameter returned from the previous API call.

> Do not specify this parameter for the first query. If the response is truncated, use the returned NextToken value in the next query to retrieve the remaining results.

nextToken.description:
The token to retrieve more results.

> If this parameter is empty, all results have been returned.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of entries returned on each page. The maximum value is 100. The default value is 20.

name.description: The name of the system tool.

description.description: The description of the system tool.

schema.description: The request result.

400.errorMessage: The specified NextToken is not valid.
400.description: The specified nextToken is invalid.

ListApiMcpServerSystemTools.title: ListApiMcpServerSystemTools
ListApiMcpServerSystemTools.summary: Lists the system tools supported by the MCP service.

ListApiMcpServers.summary: Queries all API MCP servers in an Alibaba Cloud account.

schema.description: The ID of the API MCP service.

The token to start the next query. Set this to the NextToken value returned from the previous API call.

> Do not provide this parameter for the first query. If a query does not return all results, pass the NextToken value from the previous response in the next query to retrieve the next page of results.
The maximum number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20.
The number of entries to skip.
The description of the API MCP service.
The language of the API reference for the API MCP service. You can select Chinese or English. The language of the prompt can affect the AI's response.
The time when the API MCP server was created.
The time when the API MCP server was last updated.

The type of the API MCP service.

- custom: a custom service

- system: a system service
The search keyword. Fuzzy search by API name and exact search by API ID are supported.

nextToken.description:
The paging token.

> A non-empty value indicates that there is more data to be returned.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of entries returned per page.

id.description: The ID of the API MCP service.

description.description: The description of the API MCP server.

product.description:
The product code.

- Call the GetRequestLog operation and obtain the product code from the response.

- Find the product code from the URL of the product page on the OpenAPI Portal. For example, the URL for Short Message Service is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code is \`Dysmsapi\`.

apiVersion.description: The POP version of the API that is exposed to the MCP server.

selectors.description: The list of API name matching rules.

product.description:
The product code.

- Call the GetRequestLog operation and obtain the product code from the response.

- Find the product code from the URL of the product page on the OpenAPI Portal. For example, the URL for Short Message Service is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code is \`Dysmsapi\`.

apiVersion.description: The POP version of the API that is exposed to the MCP server.

apiOverrideJson.description: The API metadata in JSON format. You can overwrite the summary and parameters fields. For an example of the format, see https\://api.alibabacloud.com/meta/v1/products/Ecs/versions/2014-05-26/apis/DescribeInstances/api.json.

executeCliCommand.description: Indicates whether to return the command-line interface (CLI) command for execution. In this mode, the API call is not executed. Instead, the corresponding CLI command is returned. This mode is suitable for long-running tasks that need to be executed using Alibaba Cloud CLI.

enableOutputSchema.description: Indicates whether to return the schema of the response parameters. Returning the schema increases the size of the API MCP server. The default value is null, which indicates that the schema is not returned.

key.description: The parameter name. Only top-level parameter names are supported. For ROA-style APIs, you can set parameters such as body.xx. You cannot set values for parameters beyond the top level.

constParameters.description: The list of constant input parameters. These parameters are not included in the output during API parameter parsing.

additionalApiDescriptions.description: The list of supplementary API descriptions.

createTime.description: The time when the API MCP server was created.

updateTime.description: The time when the API MCP server was last updated.

name.description: The prompt name.

content.description: The content of the prompt. Variables are specified in the {{xxx}} format. The xxx variable must be defined in the arguments parameter.

name.description: The parameter name.

required.description: Indicates whether the parameter is required.

items.description: A parameter supported by the prompt.

arguments.description: The list of parameters supported by the prompt.

language.description: The language of the API reference for the API MCP service. You can select Chinese or English. The language of the prompt can affect the AI's response.

sse.description: The connection information for the Server-Sent Events (SSE) protocol.

mcp.description: The connection information for the streamable HTTP protocol. This protocol is recommended.

vpcSse.description: The connection address for the SSE protocol in a VPC.

vpcMcp.description: The connection address for the streamable HTTP protocol in a VPC.

urls.description: The connection information for the API MCP service.

items.description: The name of the system tool.

name.description: The name of the MCP server. The name must be 3 to 64 characters in length, can contain lowercase letters and digits, cannot start with a digit, and must be unique within the same Alibaba Cloud account.

sourceType.description:
The type of the API MCP service.

- custom: a custom service

- system: a system service

product.description:
The product code.

- Call the GetRequestLog operation and obtain the product code from the response.

- Find the product code from the URL of the product page on the OpenAPI Portal. For example, the URL for Short Message Service is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. The product code is \`Dysmsapi\`.

name.description: The name of the system MCP service.

systemMcpServerInfo.description: The list of system MCP services.

oauthClientId.description:
The custom OAuth client ID that is used when a custom OAuth configuration is selected.

`Only Web/Native applications are supported, and the OAuth scope must include /acs/mcp-server`

instructions.description: The MCP instruction. It prompts the large model on how to use this MCP. The client must support the Instructions field of the standard MCP protocol.

enableAssumeRole.description: Indicates whether to enable multi-account access.

assumeRoleName.description: The name of the RAM role in the destination account that is assumed for cross-account operations when multi-account access is enabled.

assumeRoleExtraPolicy.description: The additional policy for role assumption when multi-account access is enabled. If this policy exists, the permissions for the role assumption are based on this policy and overwrite the permissions that are defined for the role itself.

code.description: The code for the Terraform tool. For more information, see [HCL language overview](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/terraform/latest/hcl-language-overview).

name.description: The name of the Terraform tool.

description.description: The description of the Terraform tool.

async.description: Indicates whether to execute tasks asynchronously. If this parameter is set to true, the system immediately proceeds to the next task after a task is initiated, without waiting for each resource operation to complete.

destroyPolicy.description:
The deletion policy. After a task is executed, the system applies one of the following cleanup policies to temporary resources based on the task execution status.

- NEVER: All created resources are retained, regardless of whether the task succeeds or fails.

- ALWAYS: All related resources are immediately destroyed after the task is completed, regardless of whether the task succeeds or fails.

- ON\_FAILURE: Related resources are deleted only if the task fails. If the task succeeds, the resources are retained.

publicAccess.description: Indicates whether to enable public network access.

enableCustomVpcWhitelist.description: Indicates whether to enable a custom VPC whitelist. If this parameter is disabled, the account-level configuration is used.

items.description: An entry in the VPC whitelist. The value is the ID of a source VPC.

vpcWhitelists.description: The VPC whitelist that specifies the allowed source VPCs when public network access is disabled. If this parameter is not set or is left empty, access from any source is allowed.

items.description: The information about the API MCP service.

apiMcpServers.description: The list of API MCP servers.

schema.description: The request results.

400.description: The specified nextToken is invalid.

400.description: The request uses the same nextToken as the previous request, but with different parameters. NextTokens should not be reused across non-identical requests. Each unique request must have a distinct nextToken.

500.errorMessage: The request has failed due to a temporary failure of the server.

The product code.

apiVersion.description: The POP version of the API that is exposed to the MCP server.

apiOverrideJson.description: The API metadata in JSON format. For more information about the format, see https\://api.aliyun.com/meta/v1/products/Ecs/versions/2014-05-26/apis/DescribeInstances/api.json. You can overwrite the \`summary\` and \`parameters\` fields.

executeCliCommand.description: Specifies whether to return the command-line interface (CLI) command for execution. If you set this to true, the API is not called. Instead, the corresponding CLI command is returned. This mode is suitable for long-running tasks to execute using Alibaba Cloud CLI.

enableOutputSchema.description: Specifies whether to return the schema of the response parameters. Returning the response parameter schema increases the size of the API MCP server. The default value is null, which indicates that the response parameter schema is not returned.

key.description: The parameter name. Only first-level parameter names are supported. For ROA-style APIs, set the parameter to \`body.xx\`. You cannot set a value that exceeds the top-level parameter.

constParameters.description: A list of constant input parameters. These parameters are not included in the output during API parameter parsing.

additionalApiDescriptions.description: A list of additional API descriptions.

name.description: The prompt name.

content.description: The content of the prompt. Variables are specified in the \`{{xxx}}\` format, where \`xxx\` is a variable that must be defined in the \`arguments\` parameter.

name.description: The parameter name.

required.description: Specifies whether the parameter is required.

items.description: A parameter supported by the prompt.

arguments.description: The list of parameters supported by the prompt.

language.description: The language of the API documentation for the API MCP service. Select Chinese or English API documentation. Different language prompts may affect the AI's response.

items.description: The name of the system tool.

oauthClientId.description:
The custom OAuth Client ID when selecting a custom OAuth configuration.

`Only Web/Native applications are supported, and the OAuth scope must include /acs/mcp-server.`

instructions.description: The MCP instruction. It prompts the large model on how to use the MCP. The client must support the \`Instructions\` field of the standard MCP protocol.

enableAssumeRole.description: Specifies whether to enable multi-account access.

assumeRoleName.description: If multi-account access is enabled for cross-account operations, this is the name of the RAM role of the destination account to assume.

assumeRoleExtraPolicy.description: If multi-account access is enabled, this is an additional policy for role assumption. If this policy exists, the permissions for the role assumption are based on this value, which overwrites the permissions defined for the role itself.

code.description: The Terraform tool code. For more information, see [HCL language overview](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/terraform/terraform-configuration-and-hcl-language-overview).

name.description: The name of the Terraform tool.

description.description: The description of the Terraform tool.

async.description: Specifies whether to execute the task asynchronously. If set to true, the system immediately processes the next task after a task is initiated, without waiting for each resource operation to complete.

destroyPolicy.description:
The deletion policy. After a task is complete, the system applies one of the following cleanup policies to temporary resources based on the task execution status:

- NEVER: Does not delete any created resources, regardless of whether the task succeeds or fails.

- ALWAYS: Immediately destroys all related resources after execution, regardless of whether the task succeeds or fails.

- ON\_FAILURE: Deletes related resources only if the task fails. If the task succeeds, the resources are retained.

publicAccess.description: Specifies whether to enable public network access.

enableCustomVpcWhitelist.description: Specifies whether to enable a custom VPC whitelist. If this is not enabled, the account-level configuration is used.

items.description: An entry in the VPC whitelist. The value is the ID of the source VPC.

vpcWhitelists.description: If public network access is disabled, this is the VPC whitelist that restricts the source. If this is not set or is left empty, the source is not restricted.

enablePublicAccess.description: Specifies whether to enable public network access for all API MCP Servers under the account, including the system MCP Server. Public network access is enabled by default. If this feature is disabled, the servers can be accessed only through VPC domain names.

items.description: The ID of a source VPC.

vpcWhitelists.description: The VPC whitelist. This parameter takes effect only when public network access is disabled. It specifies the VPCs that are allowed to access the servers. If you do not set this parameter or leave it empty, access is not restricted by source.
